# bccAnalysis

[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/YOURUSERNAME/bccAnalysis/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Jacob1106/bccAnalysis/actions)
[![CRAN
status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/bccAnalysis)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=bccAnalysis)

**Interactive ChIP-Seq peak analysis with Shiny: overlap detection, peak
annotation, width comparison, and visualization.**

## ‚ú® Features

- **Peak overlap analysis** with custom Venn diagrams
- **Peak annotation** using ChIPseeker + TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38
- **Width comparison** density plots
- **Export tables** (Excel) and plots (PDF)
- **Multi-sample filtering** by p-value and overlap count

## üöÄ Installation

Install: devtools::install_github(‚ÄúYOURUSERNAME/bccAnalysis‚Äù)

Load package: library(bccAnalysis)

## üéõÔ∏è Shiny App Interface

| Tab                   | Features                                                     |
|-----------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Load Files**        | Upload .rds GRangesList, select samples, set overlap filters |
| **Venn Diagram**      | Visual peak overlap between conditions                       |
| **Table of Overlaps** | Downloadable proportions + peak counts                       |
| **Width Comparison**  | Log-scale density plot                                       |
| **Peak Analysis**     | Annotation barplots (main/unique/overlap peaks)              |

## üîó Dependencies

- Bioconductor: `GenomicRanges`, `rtracklayer`,
  `TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.knownGene`, `ChIPseeker`
- CRAN: `shiny`, `bslib`, `ggplot2`, `writexl`, `tibble`, `gridExtra`

Wickham](https://r-pkgs.org/).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`ShinyApp()`](https://jacob1106.github.io/bccAnalysis/reference/ShinyApp.md)
  : Shiny App for Chip-Seq Analysis
- [`bccAnalysis`](https://jacob1106.github.io/bccAnalysis/reference/bccAnalysis.md)
  : bccAnalysis: ChIP-Seq Peak Analysis Tools
- [`compareGRangeWidth()`](https://jacob1106.github.io/bccAnalysis/reference/compareGRangeWidth.md)
  : Width Comparison of 2 GRanges Objects
- [`custom_venn_diagram()`](https://jacob1106.github.io/bccAnalysis/reference/custom_venn_diagram.md)
  : Comparing Overlap of two GRange Objects
- [`filter_by_pvalue()`](https://jacob1106.github.io/bccAnalysis/reference/filter_by_pvalue.md)
  : Filtering Function that filter by a custom p value and chromosome
  list
- [`import_samples()`](https://jacob1106.github.io/bccAnalysis/reference/import_samples.md)
  : Importing narrowPeak files and converting into a GRanges Object
- [`overlapGRangeList()`](https://jacob1106.github.io/bccAnalysis/reference/overlapGRangeList.md)
  : Filtering GRange Objects by number of overlaps with other samples.
  This function is used to merge multiple GRange Objects into one.
- [`proportionOverlapTibble()`](https://jacob1106.github.io/bccAnalysis/reference/proportionOverlapTibble.md)
  : Filtering Function that filter by a custom p value and chromosome
  list
